description: Try our easy to follow Chargrilled Beef With Kiwifruit Chimichurri recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Steak,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Beef,Potato,Quick & easy dinner,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Chargrilled Beef With Kiwifruit Chimichurri Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Halve kiwifruit and scoop flesh into a small food processor, reserving skins. Place steaks onto a board and rub both sides with fleshy sides of kiwifruit skins. Set aside for 15 minutes.
Meanwhile, reserve 2 tsp oil and add remainder to processor with coriander, parsley, garlic, vinegar and chilli flakes. Process until almost smooth. Season to taste with salt.

Heat a chargrill pan over high heat. Wipe steaks with paper towel and rub with reserved oil. Cook steaks for 4 minutes on each side for medium rare or to your liking. Transfer to a plate, cover loosely with foil and rest for 4 minutes.
Slice steaks and serve with potatoes, beans and kiwifruit balls, drizzled with chimichurri sauce.
